title: Worst version of Hamlet ever made
review:
This movie was not only the worst Hamlet but possibly the worst movie I've seen so far this year. Total hogwash

Ignore all these glowing "fake" reviews that have been upvoted by the other "fake" reviewers...

You know the movie is bad when they need to try and manipulate the score.....

Bad movie from start to finish, avoid at all costs

title: Masterful performances and direction
review: I was very impressed by this film. I thought the performances were outstanding, particularly Pat Dwyer, Jonathan Hopkins, Taylor Myers and Elise Kibler. The directors' choices made these wonderful performances even more compelling.

title: Stunning
review: What a beautiful and haunting adaptation. Taylor Myers, as mastermind director & lead, is a force to be reckoned with. Chilling performances by the entirety of the cast as well. Bravo.
